Author: jl777c#5810
Content: ps2h script has size limit

Content: each item 576 bytes (I think)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: total size of 10kb or so

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: to spend a p2sh output, you need to produce the full redeemscript, each and everytime

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is hard to come up with a more inefficient method

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is indeed possible to make a CC where you register a multisig set of pubkeys just once and then in the future sign it without repeatedly providing the list of all the pubkeys of the signers, but just the signatures

Author: Hollowman9000#3344
Content: How does protocol handle stack overflows

Author: Hollowman9000#3344
Content: Calculate 384^384384384

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it doesnt

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is designed so you cant overflow the stack

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: no recursion, not even looping, size limits to the script

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so max depth the stack can get is set to be smaller than the stack . that is allocated
